attributes.additional_details: People who drink fizzy/sugary drinks within a balanced diet will be punished as a result of this crazy tax that is being proposed. Parents should take more responsibility with what their children eat and drink, it is not the governments job to take care of this for them. People aged between 16-30 will be hugely affected by an increased in price as fizzy drinks are already at a premium price compared to only 5 years ago. STOP THE TAX
